author: ubnsekpong
title: Start Haskell Community: Beginners
description: Most Developers in Nigeria do not have the knowledge of Haskell and entry to build Dapps on Cardano. We will build a community.
solution: We will build a community of Haskell Developers by partnering with hubs, training beginners from 0 to Hero level in Haskell.
experience: Team of University Lecturers, Software Developers, Haskell developers and Plutus Pioneer.
